1.1 hype train choo choo!

Backstory: My PC randomly crashes and hangs for no reason and often takes ages to load

 

Apparently, I've learned that the reason my PC has so many problems is that my motherboard is faulty!

 

1.1 may be the first version of KSP that I play on a powerful stable computer. I hope that I heard the multi threaded physics correctly.

 

Now for
